title: Scrumptious Lentil Soup
directions: Press the saute button on your instant pot and saute your onion in 2 tbsp of oil (or a little water or broth) for about a minute.
Add your carrots and saute for another minute.
Add bay leaves, thyme, broth, red and brown lentils, potato and stir.
Lock the lid in place and push the soup button and set for 6 minutes.
Remove the lid and remove bay leaves.
Add 1 tsp of salt, pepper to taste, and 1½ cups of corn.
ingredients: 2 tbsp canola oil for sautéing (or use a bit of water/broth for oil free)
